DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this observational study is to describe the incidence of adverse events among patients treated with BeneFix速 in usual health care settings in Germany.
DOC.brief_title: Registry For Patients Treated With BeneFix In Usual Care Setting In Germany
DOC.detailed_description: Non-interventional study: subjects to be selected according to the usual clinical practice of their physician
DOC.criteria: Patients with hemophilia B already receiving or starting treatment with reformulated BeneFIX速. Patients with hemophilia B treated with a product other than BeneFIX速. Inclusion in the ongoing prospective registry of European hemophilia B patients using BeneFIX速.
